sys_remote_update_set.description: A search utility that leverages the 'sn_codesearch' application used by App Studio for performing string searches across multiple tables. This is based on the out-of-the-box sample page 'CodeSearchExampleUse', but rather than only searching custom applications, this page performs a system-wide search across all scopes, including GLOBAL. The search page uses the default search group and no configuration is needed. This version also includes an option to gather additional details from each result in the search results. ______________________ Rick Marsha - 20 Sep 2020 Questions or issues: rick.marsha.sn@gmail.com
sys_remote_update_set.name: RGM Global Code Search - v2

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_874a3afa2fbed010b30c49e72799b634
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.RGMGlobalCodeSearch</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>RGMGlobalCodeSearch</name><script><![CDATA[var RGMGlobalCodeSearch = Class.create();
RGMGlobalCodeSearch.prototype = {
	initialize: function () {
	},
	
	getRecordDetails : function(recordTable, recordSysID) {
		if (!recordTable || !recordSysID) return;
		
		var recordGr = new GlideRecord(recordTable);
		var objDetails = {};
		
		if (recordGr.get(recordSysID)) {
			// get the core fields
			objDetails['sys_created_on'] = recordGr.getValue('sys_created_on');
			objDetails['sys_created_by'] = recordGr.getValue('sys_created_by');
			objDetails['sys_updated_on'] = recordGr.getValue('sys_updated_on');
			objDetails['sys_updated_by'] = recordGr.getValue('sys_updated_by');
			objDetails['sys_mod_count']  = recordGr.getValue('sys_mod_count');

			if (recordGr.isValidField('sys_scope')) {
				objDetails['sys_scope'] = recordGr.sys_domain.getDisplayValue().toUpperCase() || 'GLOBAL';
			} else {
				objDetails['sys_domain'] = 'none';
			}
			
			if (recordGr.isValidField('sys_domain')) {
				objDetails['sys_domain'] = recordGr.sys_domain.getDisplayValue().toUpperCase() || 'GLOBAL';
			} else {
				objDetails['sys_domain'] = 'none';
			}
			
			if (recordGr.isValidField('active')) {
				objDetails['active'] = (recordGr.getValue('active') == '1').toString();
			} else {
				objDetails['active'] = 'none';
			}
			
		}

		return JSON.stringify(objDetails);
		
	},

	type: 'RGMGlobalCodeSearch'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-08-27 02:39:30</sys_created_on><sys_id>874a3afa2fbed010b30c49e72799b634</sys_id><sys_mod_count>31</sys_mod_count><sys_name>RGMGlobalCodeSearch</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_874a3afa2fbed010b30c49e72799b634</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-09-19 22:45:37</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

Message is " + errorThrown); }); return false; } // *** F U N C T I O N s n _ c o d e s e a r c h _ c l e a r S e l e c t i o n s ( ) ********************* // // Clears the search form HTML fields // function sn_codesearch_clearSelections() { $j("#sn_codesearch_table").val(''); $j("#sn_codesearch_term").val(''); return false; } // *** F U N C T I O N g e t H i t D e t a i l s ( ) ********************* // // // function getHitDetails(hit) { var csGa = new GlideAjax('RGMGlobalCodeSearchAjax'); csGa.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getRecordDetails'); csGa.addParam('sysparm_table', hit.className); csGa.addParam('sysparm_sys_id', hit.sysId); csGa.getXMLWait(); var returnVal = csGa.getAnswer(); hit.hit_details = JSON.parse(returnVal); return hit; } // *** F U N C T I O N w r i t e O u t p u t F o r T a b l e ( ) ********************* // // Summary: Called from the main worker for each search table result (top-level accordion) // function writeOutputForTable(data) { if (!data) { return; } if (data.hits.length < 1) { return; } // *** L E V E L 1 - MAIN RESULTS (TABLE) *********************** // This is the top-layer accordion results // var header = '
'; header += ''; header += '
' + data.tableLabel + '' + (data.hits.length || 0) + '
'; header += ''; var objHeader = $j(header); var result_body = '
'; // *** L E V E L 2 - SPECIFIC RECORDS FOR EACH LEVEL 1 TABLE (HIT) *********************** // These are the sub-accordions found under each Level 1 accordion // $j.each(data.hits, function(idx, hit) { var header2 = ''; var shouldHide = ''; if (data.hits.length == 1) { shouldHide = ' in'; } var hitDetailsIsActive = 'none'; if ($j("#csearch_include_details").is(":checked")) { // passing hit object to get the hit details injected hit = getHitDetails(hit); hitDetailsIsActive = hit.hit_details.active.toString(); } // for debugging the payload: //header2 += '
' + JSON.stringify(hit) + '
'; // // console.log(hit); header2 += '
'; header2 += '
'; header2 += '
'; // ******************** header2 += '
'; header2 += ' '; header2 += ' '; header2 += ' '; header2 += ' '; header2 += ' '; header2 += ' '; header2 += ' '; header2 += ' '; header2 += '
'; header2 += ' '; header2 += '
'; header2 += '
' + hit.name + '' + (hit.matches.length || 0) + '
'; header2 += '
'; header2 += ' '; header2 += ' 		'; header2 += '
'; if (hitDetailsIsActive == 'true') { header2 += '
'; } else if (hitDetailsIsActive == 'false') { header2 += ' '; } else if (hitDetailsIsActive != 'none') { header2 += ' '; } header2 += ' 		'; header2 += '
'; header2 += ' '; header2 += '
Versions ➚
'; header2 += ' '; header2 += ' '; header2 += '
Open ➚
'; header2 += ' '; header2 += '
'; header2 += '
'; header2 += '
'; // ******************** var result_desc = header2 + '
'; var text = ''; text += '
'; if ($j("#csearch_include_details").is(":checked")) { // HIT DETAILS PANEL var fieldsArr = ['sys_created_on', 'sys_created_by', 'sys_updated_on', 'sys_updated_by']; text += ' '; for (var i = 0; i < fieldsArr.length; i++) { text += ''; text += ' '; text += ' '; text += ''; } text += ''; text += '
' + fieldsArr[i] + ':' + hit.hit_details[fieldsArr[i]] + '
'; // HIT DETAILS PANEL 2 fieldsArr = ['active', 'sys_mod_count', 'sys_scope', 'sys_domain']; text += ''; for (var a = 0; a < fieldsArr.length; a++) { text += ''; text += ' '; text += ' '; text += ''; } text += ''; text += '
' + fieldsArr[a] + ':' + hit.hit_details[fieldsArr[a]] + '
'; } text += '
'; // *** L E V E L 3 - INSTANCE OF SPECIFIC MATCH IN THE RECORD (MATCH) *********************** // This is the child panel containing the code matches // $j.each(hit.matches, function(indx, match) { // for debugging the payload: //text += '
' + JSON.stringify(match) + '
'; // var labelSpacer = indx > 0 ? 'style="margin-top: 5px"' : ''; text += '
' + match.fieldLabel + '
'; text += '
';

            var lastLine = 0;

            // *** L E V E L 4 - SINGLE LINE OF CODE FROM EACH MATCH.  ***********************
            // ADDS ONE LINE BEFORE THE MATCH AND ONE AFTER.
            //
            $j.each(match.lineMatches, function(ix, fieldLine) {
                // for debugging the payload:
                //text += '
' + JSON.stringify(fieldLine) + '
';
                //
                var borderClass = '';

                // set the flag for highlighted separator if the next line is out of sequence
                if (lastLine > 0 && fieldLine.line > (lastLine + 1)) {
                    borderClass = 'hit-red';
                }

                try {
                    // highlight the match for this code line by injecting open/close  tags
                    // so the CSS will pick up the highlighting
                    //
                    // STEP 1 - escape term to html so it matches the encoded response
                    // STEP 2 - escape the output of STEP 1 to make it regex-friendly
                    //
                    var escSrchTrm = $j("#sn_codesearch_term").val().replace(/[&<>"'\/]/g,
                        function(s) {
                            var entityMap = {
                                "&": "&",
                                "<": "<",
                                ">": ">",
                                '"': '"',
                                "'": ''',
                                "/": '/'
                            };

                            return entityMap[s];

                        }).replace(/[-[\]{}()*+?.,\\^$|#\s]/g, "\\$&");

                    var hitRegEx = new RegExp(escSrchTrm, 'gi');
                    var hitlineTxt = fieldLine.escaped.replace(hitRegEx,
                        function(val) {
                            //console.log(val);
                            if (val) {
                                return '' + val + '';
                            }
                        });

                    /*
                    // debugging
                    if (ix < 10) {
                    	console.log('hitlineTxt=' + hitlineTxt);
                    }
                    */

                    text += '';

                } catch (err) {


                }

                lastLine = fieldLine.line;

            });

            text += '
' + fieldLine.line + '' + hitlineTxt + '
'; }); text += ''; // button up the HTML result_body += '' + result_desc + text + '
'; }); result_body += "
"; // send final body to the results DIV $j(result_body).appendTo(objHeader); return objHeader; } // *** F U N C T I O N s o r t R e s u l t s ( ) ********************* // // Summary: Sorts and stuff // function sortResults(obj, prop, asc) { obj.sort(function(a, b) { if (asc) { return (a[prop] > b[prop]) ? 1 : ((a[prop] < b[prop]) ? -1 : 0); } else { return (b[prop] > a[prop]) ? 1 : ((b[prop] < a[prop]) ? -1 : 0); } }); return obj; }]]>Calls rgm_code_search_macro to build the search form content. Once the form is submitted, calls function sn_codesearch_getResults() found in the client script _____________________________ Updated by Rick Marsha: 22aug2020 For questions or issues: rick.marsha.sn@gmail.comfalse

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_a10cd9ed2ff21010b30c49e72799b6d5
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.RGMGlobalCodeSearchAjax</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>RGMGlobalCodeSearchAjax</name><script><![CDATA[var RGMGlobalCodeSearchAjax = Class.create();
RGMGlobalCodeSearchAjax.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	
    getRecordDetails: function() {
        var recordTable = this.getParameter('sysparm_table');
        var recordSysID = this.getParameter('sysparm_sys_id');
        var returnVal = new RGMGlobalCodeSearch().getRecordDetails(recordTable, recordSysID);
		
		return returnVal;
		
    },

    type: 'RGMGlobalCodeSearchAjax'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-08-22 22:35:13</sys_created_on><sys_id>a10cd9ed2ff21010b30c49e72799b6d5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>RGMGlobalCodeSearchAjax</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_a10cd9ed2ff21010b30c49e72799b6d5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-09-05 19:58:12</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
